name: VALZ
description:
When you have to be a warrior but you’re a bard...

• Pick a song and use it as your weapon to fight.
• Engage in contest of rhythm, beat monsters to the beat of music.
• Unleash your special team attack and change the dynamic of the song as you fight.

VALZ is a music-themed RPG with rhythm battle system. It features an imaginary world with music as its core, told in gorgeous gritty-styled motion comic story-telling by Indonesian comic maestro – John G. Reinhart. Play original songs crafted specially to be your weapon of choice and be empowered by the powerful magic of rock music. Experience how music can literally empower you and save your loved ones!
